zh-cn: 中国五金电工进口公司
中国五金矿产进出口公司
中国五金矿产进出口总公司

location.zh-cn: 中国北京市东城区朝阳门北大街3号五矿广场A座
location.en: Minmetals Plaza Tower A, No. 3 Chaoyangmen North Street, Dongcheng District, Beijing, China

description.zh-cn: 一家由国务院国资委直接监管的中国中央企业，是以金属、矿产品的开发、生产、贸易和综合服务为主的大型国际化企业集团。公司成立于1950年，前身为中国矿产公司。公司注册地为三里河路5号楼。
description.en: A Chinese central state-owned enterprise directly supervised by SASAC, it is a large international enterprise group focusing on the development, production, trade and comprehensive services of metals and mineral products. The company was established in 1950, formerly known as China National Minerals Co., Ltd. Its registered address is at Building 5, Sanlihe Road.

description.zh-cn: 中国五矿集团公司董事长。
description.en: Chairman of China Minmetals Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国五矿集团公司董事长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Chairman of China Minmetals Corporation.

nodes.id: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会

zh-cn: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会
en: State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的特设直属机构，代表国家履行出资人职责。
description.en: A special directly-affiliated institution under the State Council of the People's Republic of China, which performs the responsibilities of an investor on behalf of the state.

zh-cn: 中国冶金科工集团有限公司

description.zh-cn: 中国五矿集团公司的全资子企业，主要从事工程承包、资源开发、装备制造等业务。
description.en: A wholly-owned subsidiary of China Minmetals Corporation, primarily engaged in engineering contracting, resource development, and equipment manufacturing.

description.zh-cn: 中国五矿集团公司旗下的上市公司。
description.en: A listed company under China Minmetals Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 中国五矿集团公司旗下的上市公司。
description.en: A listed company under China Minmetals Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 中国五矿集团公司旗下的上市公司。
description.en: A listed company under China Minmetals Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 中国五矿集团公司旗下的上市公司。
description.en: A listed company under China Minmetals Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 中国五矿集团公司旗下的上市公司。
description.en: A listed company under China Minmetals Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 中国五矿集团公司旗下的香港上市公司。
description.en: A Hong Kong listed company under China Minmetals Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 中国五矿集团公司旗下的香港上市公司。
description.en: A Hong Kong listed company under China Minmetals Corporation.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The chief administrative authority of the People's Republic of China.

en: Government Administration Council of the Central People's Government

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期的国家政务的最高管理机关，是今天中华人民共和国国务院的前身。
description.en: The highest administrative body of state affairs in the early days of the People's Republic of China, and the predecessor of today's State Council of the People's Republic of China.

en: Ministry of Trade of the Central People's Government

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府主管贸易的部门。
description.en: The department in charge of trade under the Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国家工商行政管理总局

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家工商行政管理总局
国家工商行政管理总局
en: State Administration for Industry and Commerce

description.zh-cn: 曾是中华人民共和国国务院主管市场监督管理和行政执法工作的直属机构，现已撤销，职能并入国家市场监督管理总局。
description.en: Formerly a direct agency under the State Council of the People's Republic of China in charge of market supervision, administration, and law enforcement. It has been abolished, and its functions have been merged into the State Administration for Market Regulation.

description.zh-cn: 一家位于湖南省的矿业公司。
description.en: A mining company based in Hunan province.

zh-cn: 中国五矿稀土有限公司

description.zh-cn: 中国五矿集团公司旗下的上市公司，主要从事稀土业务。
description.en: A listed company under China Minmetals Corporation, primarily engaged in the rare earth business.

description.zh-cn: 由多家中国稀土企业合并组建的中央企业，旨在优化稀土产业布局。
description.en: A central state-owned enterprise formed by the merger of several Chinese rare earth companies, aiming to optimize the layout of the rare earth industry.

nodes.id: 中国铝业稀土金属公司

zh-cn: 中国铝业稀土金属公司
en: Chinalco Rare Earth & Metals Co., Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 中国铝业集团旗下的稀土业务公司，后合并组建中国稀土集团。
description.en: A rare earth business company under Chinalco, which later merged to form China Rare Earth Group.

nodes.id: 中国南方稀土集团有限公司

zh-cn: 中国南方稀土集团有限公司
en: China Southern Rare Earth Group Co., Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 一家位于江西省赣州市的稀土企业，后合并组建中国稀土集团。
description.en: A rare earth enterprise located in Ganzhou, Jiangxi province, which later merged to form China Rare Earth Group.

description.zh-cn: 一家澳大利亚矿业公司。
description.en: An Australian mining company.

description.zh-cn: 中国五矿集团公司在收购OZ Minerals资产后成立的子公司。
description.en: A subsidiary of China Minmetals Corporation, established after the acquisition of assets from OZ Minerals.

description.zh-cn: 澳大利亚的联邦行政权力机构。
description.en: The federal executive authority of Australia.

description.zh-cn: 澳大利亚政治家，曾任澳大利亚财政部长。
description.en: Australian politician, former Treasurer of Australia.

description.zh-cn: 澳大利亚政府的主要经济政策咨询机构。
description.en: The main economic policy advisory body of the Australian Government.

description.zh-cn: 一家在刚果民主共和国拥有矿山的加拿大矿业公司。
description.en: A Canadian mining company with operations in the Democratic Republic of Congo.

description.zh-cn: 一家加拿大铜矿公司。
description.en: A Canadian copper mining company.

description.zh-cn: 一家总部位于加拿大的全球性黄金和铜生产商。
description.en: A global gold and copper producer headquartered in Canada.

relationships.target: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国五矿集团公司是由国务院国有资产监督管理委员会直接监管的国有公司。
description.en: China Minmetals is a state-owned company directly supervised by the State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission (SASAC).

relationships.source: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 国务院国资委是中华人民共和国国务院的直属特设机构，代表国务院履行出资人职责。
description.en: SASAC is a special institution directly under the State Council of the People's Republic of China and performs investor's responsibilities on behalf of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 根据信息框，陈得信是中国五矿集团公司的董事长。
description.en: According to the infobox, Chen Dexin is the Chairman of China Minmetals Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 根据文本，翁祖亮是中国五矿集团公司的董事长。
description.en: According to the text, Weng Zuliang is the Chairman of China Minmetals Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 2015年12月8日，经国务院批准，中国冶金科工集团有限公司整体并入中国五矿集团公司，成为其全资子企业。
description.en: On December 8, 2015, with the approval of the State Council, China Metallurgical Group Corporation was wholly merged into China Minmetals Corporation, becoming its wholly-owned subsidiary.

relationships.target: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会

description.zh-cn: 在并入中国五矿之前，中国中冶是国资委直接监管企业。合并后不再作为国资委直接监管企业。
description.en: Before merging into China Minmetals, MCC was directly supervised by SASAC. After the merger, it was no longer directly supervised by SASAC.

description.zh-cn: 五矿资本是中国五矿集团公司旗下的上市公司。
description.en: Minmetals Capital is a listed company under China Minmetals Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 五矿发展是中国五矿集团公司旗下的上市公司。
description.en: Minmetals Development is a listed company under China Minmetals Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 中钨高新是中国五矿集团公司旗下的上市公司。
description.en: China Tungsten and Hightech Materials is a listed company under China Minmetals Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 株冶集团是中国五矿集团公司旗下的上市公司。
description.en: Zhuzhou Smelter Group is a listed company under China Minmetals Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 长远锂科是中国五矿集团公司旗下的上市公司。
description.en: Changyuan Lico is a listed company under China Minmetals Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 五矿资源是中国五矿集团公司旗下的上市公司。
description.en: MMG Limited is a listed company under China Minmetals Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 五矿地产是中国五矿集团公司旗下的上市公司。
description.en: Minmetals Land is a listed company under China Minmetals Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 五矿稀土是中国五矿集团公司旗下的上市公司。
description.en: Minmetals Rare Earth is a listed company under China Minmetals Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 1950年4月，中央人民政府政务院决定成立中国五矿集团公司的前身“中国矿产公司”。
description.en: In April 1950, the Government Administration Council of the Central People's Government decided to establish 'China National Minerals Co., Ltd.', the predecessor of China Minmetals Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 中国五矿集团公司的前身“中国矿产公司”成立时隶属于中央人民政府贸易部。
description.en: The predecessor of China Minmetals Corporation, 'China National Minerals Co., Ltd.', was subordinate to the Ministry of Trade of the Central People's Government upon its establishment.

relationships.source: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会

description.zh-cn: 2004年1月，经国务院国资委审核批准，中国五金矿产进出口总公司更名为“中国五矿集团公司”。
description.en: In January 2004, with the approval of SASAC, China National Metals and Minerals Import and Export Corporation was renamed 'China Minmetals Corporation'.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国家工商行政管理总局

description.zh-cn: 2004年1月，经国家工商行政管理总局审核批准，中国五金矿产进出口总公司更名为“中国五矿集团公司”。
description.en: In January 2004, with the approval of the State Administration for Industry and Commerce, China National Metals and Minerals Import and Export Corporation was renamed 'China Minmetals Corporation'.

description.zh-cn: 2009年至2011年，五矿集团获中央授权，以100%股份成为湖南有色集团控股股东。
description.en: From 2009 to 2011, Minmetals Group was authorized by the central government to become the controlling shareholder of Hunan Nonferrous Metals Holding Group with 100% of its shares.

description.zh-cn: 2021年12月，五矿稀土与多家稀土企业合并，组建中国稀土集团。
description.en: In December 2021, Minmetals Rare Earth merged with several other rare earth companies to form China Rare Earth Group.

relationships.source: 中国铝业稀土金属公司

description.zh-cn: 2021年12月，中国铝业稀土金属公司与多家稀土企业合并，组建中国稀土集团。
description.en: In December 2021, Chinalco Rare Earth & Metals Co., Ltd. merged with several other rare earth companies to form China Rare Earth Group.

relationships.source: 中国南方稀土集团有限公司

description.zh-cn: 2021年12月，中国南方稀土集团有限公司与多家稀土企业合并，组建中国稀土集团。
description.en: In December 2021, China Southern Rare Earth Group Co., Ltd. merged with several other rare earth companies to form China Rare Earth Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国五矿于2009年6月收购了澳洲矿企OZ Minerals的几乎所有矿业资产。
description.en: In June 2009, China Minmetals acquired almost all mining assets of the Australian mining company OZ Minerals.

description.zh-cn: 中国五矿在收购OZ Minerals的资产后，成立了子公司矿产金属集团（MMG）。
description.en: After acquiring assets from OZ Minerals, China Minmetals established the subsidiary Minerals and Metals Group (MMG).

description.zh-cn: 在收购OZ Minerals资产的交易中，澳大利亚政府以国家安全为由阻止了Prominent Hill矿的出售。
description.en: In the acquisition of OZ Minerals' assets, the Australian Government blocked the sale of the Prominent Hill mine on national security grounds.

description.zh-cn: 韦恩-斯万时任澳大利亚财政部长。
description.en: Wayne Swan was the Treasurer of Australia at the time.

description.zh-cn: 澳大利亚财政部是澳大利亚政府的部门之一。
description.en: The Department of the Treasury is a department of the Government of Australia.

description.zh-cn: 2011年，中国五矿集团下属的五矿资源有限公司收购了加拿大企业Anvil矿业有限公司。
description.en: In 2011, MMG Limited, a subsidiary of China Minmetals, acquired the Canadian company Anvil Mining Limited.

description.zh-cn: 2011年，埃奎诺克斯矿业拒绝了中国五矿集团提出的65亿美元的收购要约。
description.en: In 2011, Equinox Minerals rejected a US$6.5 billion takeover offer from China Minmetals.

description.zh-cn: 巴里克黄金公司对埃奎诺克斯矿业提出了比中国五矿高16%的收购价格，最终成功收购，从而阻止了中国五矿的收购企图。
description.en: Barrick Gold made a 16% higher offer for Equinox Minerals than China Minmetals, eventually succeeding in the acquisition and thus blocking China Minmetals' attempt.

description.zh-cn: 2011年，埃奎诺克斯矿业接受了巴里克黄金公司的收购。
description.en: In 2011, Equinox Minerals was acquired by Barrick Gold.
